title: what DOES a Scuttle attack?
body:
What does a Scuttle eat???
{{summoner:31}}  please no
{{item:2010}}  hell nah
HONEY FRUIT.
can we get em to eat the honeyfruit if you dont kill it?

replies.body:
They... they already do that.

If you attack a honeyfruit and scuttle is nearbye he will go eat them.

> [{quoted}](name=Zezockary,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pxu9uTOe,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-01T08:36:01.661+0000)
>
> They... they already do that.
> 
> If you attack a honeyfruit and scuttle is nearbye he will go eat them.

it doesnt consume its just hovers above

NO! Amp it up! Make the scuttle viciously and quickly eat any foreseeable Honey Fruit to ensure its eaten up, or if you plan to slow someone down with the fruit, you will just have to kill scuttle first in order to prevent the blood thirsty honey fruit eater to not foil your dastardly plans that no one expects since its low elo.
